short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enjoy Full Width of StackOverFlow without any distraction.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enjoy a distraction-free view of questions and answers as sidebars are removed, and content stretches to fill the entire width. Say goodbye to clutter and hello to focused learning and collaboration.
